content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://www.google-analytics.com https://*.ytimg.com  https://www.googleapis.com https://*.ytimg.com https://*.gettab1.site https://*.vmn.net https://api.facebook.com https://*.twitter.com; object-src 'self'

name: GetTab New Tab
